content.description: Moriah is in favor of community programs that encourage recycling. She joins an online social media group that supports recycling, and the members frequently discuss the importance of recycling. After Moriah is in the group for several months, her views have become even more favorable toward recycling than they were when she joined the group. Moriah also notes that the views of the rest of the group have become more strongly favorable toward recycling as well.
content.question: Which of the following processes accounts for this change?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
